name: Adojuru (puzzle)
description:
Adojuru is a 19 piece puzzle game.
This is indeed a competitive game in which players must submit their high score. 
Only the top 100 scores will be displayed and the rest will be in the non-admitted (NA) category. 
Adojuru is a puzzle different from others because it allows players to start the game in a comfortable way.
This is how the player can:
- RANDOM: randomly mix the puzzle pieces to start
The player also has the possibility to surf on other menus such as:
- The menu see the photo
- The settings menu to choose a music or a game background color
Once the level is completed, the player will need to register or log in if they have not done so yet
He should see his username and a submit button. (This version can only be submitted 3 times per day. 
If you want more, please upgrade to the paid version by clicking here)
The paid version also gives you the possibility to save and download your data in order to play on any device (android, windows, mac, linux)
Finally, you can submit your score
